mapper.select: SELECT er.enteredroom_id, er.member_id, er.room_id, er.status, er.entired_time, m.username, m.email, m.password, m.role, m.profile, m.nickname, m.member_type, r.name FROM SSAFYHOME.ENTEREDROOM er LEFT JOIN SSAFYHOME.MEMBERS m ON er.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN SSAFYHOME.ROOM r ON er.room_id = r.room_id

SELECT er.enteredroom_id, er.member_id, er.room_id, er.status, er.entired_time, m.username, m.email, m.password, m.role, m.profile, m.nickname, m.member_type, r.name FROM SSAFYHOME.ENTEREDROOM er LEFT JOIN SSAFYHOME.MEMBERS m ON er.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN SSAFYHOME.ROOM r ON er.room_id = r.room_id WHERE er.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT er.enteredroom_id, er.member_id, er.room_id, er.status, er.entired_time, m.username, m.email, m.password, m.role, m.profile, m.nickname, m.member_type, r.name FROM SSAFYHOME.ENTEREDROOM er LEFT JOIN SSAFYHOME.MEMBERS m ON er.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN SSAFYHOME.ROOM r ON er.room_id = r.room_id WHERE er.room_id = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SSAFYHOME.ENTEREDROOM (room_id, member_id, status, entired_time) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{memberId}, #{status}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE))
